name: Sokoban - Recreating the original 1982 game
description:
Welcome to * * S O K O B A N  * *!

The original puzzle game, the boxing legend, the really really simple, difficult, experience.

This is my attempt to re-create the original game's first few levels, in Unity.

One of my first few projects, re creating one of my all time favourite games.
https://github.com/barnemesh/Sokoban-1982-Recreation
https://github.com/barnemesh/Sokoban-1982-Enhanced

Objective

You have a part-time job at a big warehouse company! Your job is to clear up 20 warehouses. Please try your best. However, since the boxes are large, you can only push one by one. If you do poorly, the box will get stuck! Please be careful.

Controls

The original games controls are wack - 

When you fail or finish the job press the F•1 to do anything! Space instead in WebGL build.

Move with arrows keys! ↑ ←  ↓  →

Q will quit the executable version.

Know that like in the orignal game - there is life limit on reseting the game! that is not shown anywhere. 

This version does not save you progress.
